mapper.select: select seq id, board_seq cid,user_id uid, user_name username,img_url p ,comment c , reg_dt rd from dancing9_board_comment with(nolock) where seq=#{ID}
select seq id, board_seq cid,user_id uid, user_name username,img_url p ,comment c , reg_dt rd from SSKDB.dbo.SSK5_BOARD_COMMENT with(nolock) where seq=#{ID};
